UsageResourceBillingPolicy.name: UsageResourceBillingPolicy
UsageResourceBillingPolicy.description: Represents information about how the usage is accumulated before rating a usage resource.

Code.description: A unique user-defined string for the usage resource billing policy.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: The name of the usage resource billing policy record.

UsageAccumulationMethod.description: The method used to accumulate the usage.

UsageAccumulationPeriod.description: The duration for which the usage is accumulated.
